com.eduworks.ec.framework

Class ModalManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eduworks.ec.framework.ViewManager
      • com.eduworks.ec.framework.ModalManager

  • public class ModalManager
extends ViewManager
    View Manager sub class that manages loading "modal"s and has a few helper functions to make sure that they work properly
    Author:
    djunker

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModalManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static EcModal getCurrentModal()
      Retrieves the current view that corresponds to the Modal Container Element (Should be a Modal)
      static void hideModal()
      Hides the modal container and returns to the screen or overlay that was being displayed beneath it
      static void showModal(EcModal modal, org.stjs.javascript.functions.Callback0 callback)
      Sets the current modal and then shows it by calling the modals display function

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentModal

        public static EcModal getCurrentModal()
        Retrieves the current view that corresponds to the Modal Container Element (Should be a Modal)
        Returns:
        EcModal instance that is currently being shown in the Modal container element

      • showModal

        public static void showModal(EcModal modal,
                             org.stjs.javascript.functions.Callback0 callback)
        Sets the current modal and then shows it by calling the modals display function
        Parameters:
        modal - Modal Instance to be displayed in the modal container and set as current
        callback - Function to invoke after the modal has been displayed

      • hideModal

        public static void hideModal()
        Hides the modal container and returns to the screen or overlay that was being displayed beneath it
